lines.text: You sat up with me?
Yeah.
Why?
Somebody had to. You was raving so. No one could sleep.
Why should you care?
I don't. I'd done it for a dog if he was sufferin'.
Thank you.
You're welcome.
Choosin' a way to die? What's the difference? Choosin' a way to live - that's the hard part.
Now ain't that the way? A man gets set for trouble head-on and it sneaks up behind him every time!
That's life.
They're men, honey, and you ain't. Remember that.
Here you are. Breakfast in bed.
What's this?
You better eat it *before* we tell you.

[Betrayed by Ben]
I deserve it. Do business with the Devil and you get it every time.

[Expressing initial reluctance to accompany Kemp]
Trail's as plain to you as it is to me!

[Observing how hard it will be to get Vandergroat off the mountain]
Looks like you got a real interestin' problem in logistics.
Money splits better two ways than it does with three.
Nuthin' like a good woman to stir the pot!
Nuthin' like a good woman!
Guess you got the years to know better than any of us, Jesse. Did you ever marry one of 'em?
Never had to with my good looks!
[Laughter]

[Referring to Vandergroat]
He's not a man; he's a sack of money!
